**Example 1: CreateSubProject**



Input: 

```
tccli solar CreateSubProject --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ProjectId prj-ipyzubygh7 \
    --SubProjectName 子项目3
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "b3600119-bb08-4c5a-8331-d46908d6da02",
        "SubProjectId": "subprj-8jkiiqwwtf"
    }
}
```
